description: A lot of people choose to forgo drinking altogether when trying to watch their calorie intake, but that doesn't mean you have to give up&nbsp;cocktails entirely. Lemon Spritz is a low-calorie cocktail that still packs a punch.This drink is perfect for anyone looking for a satisfying&nbsp;beverage without all the added sugar. So next time you're looking for something fun to do, why not gather your friends and enjoy a few Lemon Spritz cocktails? They're surprisingly healthy!
name: Lemon Spritz
